name: RSI-Volume Breakout Momentum (S&P-500)
description: Daily-based momentum strategy for large-cap S&P-500 stocks. Longs trigger when RSI(14) breaks above 60 with a 25%+ volume surge over the 30-day average; shorts trigger on RSI(14) below 40 with the same volume confirmation. Positions are sized at 1 % of equity. Hard 2 % stop-loss and 5 % take-profit brackets are attached, while soft exits occur on RSI retracements or ±4 % adverse/favourable price moves. Designed for moderately aggressive capital growth using end-of-day data only.
